changeSet.author: antoszj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE book(id bigint NOT NULL, author character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", title character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", version integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT book_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id))
INSERT INTO book(id, author, title, version) VALUES(nextval('book_sequence'), 'Thorben Janssen', 'Hibernate Tips - More than 70 solutions to common Hibernate problems', 0);
INSERT INTO book(id, author, title, version) VALUES(nextval('book_sequence'), 'Vlad Mihalcea', 'High-Performance Java Persistence', 0);

changeSet.author: antoszj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE account(iban character varying(26) NOT NULL, owner character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", balance bigint, CONSTRAINT account_pkey PRIMARY KEY (iban))

CREATE TABLE account_versioned(iban character varying(26) NOT NULL, owner character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", balance bigint, version integer NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT accountv_pkey PRIMARY KEY (iban))
